dt: {bc}a person or device that {d_link|dials|dial:2} something (such as a telephone)

dt.t: With the purchase of the right list, telephone {wi}dialers{/wi} can force themselves and their cause on strangers, something the Internet can't do without unleashing a torrent of angry responses from e-mail users …
Her group put together a petition signed by more than 100,000 consumers demanding that regulators crack down on companies … using automated {wi}dialers{/wi} and recorded voices to market scams.

shortdef: a person or device that dials something (such as a telephone)
